mema kala parichchedaya thula ohu liyu ”samajaye aarthika wardhanaya pilibanda niyamaya saha rusiyawa thula samajawadaye karthawyayo” nam lipiyak, wiplawaya pilibanda wardhanaya wemin pawathi thama sankalpanaya thula ohu gowinge pasekin nirdhana panthiya da ek kara ganima patan gath ayuru pilibanda sakshya sapayayi.(20) ee athara, tar-weganiyan nirikshanaya kala paridi, ”pa්radhana nagarawala kamkaruwange wiplawaya, gowinge wiplawayehi sahaya pinisa awila ennak wanu athayi ohu thawamath sithiya.

alla ganima saha wen wen wikunum prakashayata path kirima; apa sidu swechcha wirasaka athi, wenath aakarayakin, bahara kala ayata erehiwa bawa ho owun thaba atha ema ahimi kirimata, awashya nowi, miladi ganum pradanaya karanu labana amathara gasthuwak natha. 48 waganthiya wayasa awurudu wasara daha hatharakata wahalun danata rasakawili wada haka, indigo saha wasasthana lesa karanna, hata dakwa ihatha, miladi ganima, mila atha de hara, naya sandaha athadanguwata gena kala, ho rasakawili , nosalakilla, wasaya kirima, owun wada karana, sabawinma athpath kara gena atha; thahanam kirima, nishpala de saha wasasthana pilibanda niyogaya magin saba athpath kara ganima ha winishchaya kirima idiriyata gena yama, thahanam kirima, 49 waganthiya adhikarana gowi rasakawili, indigo, ho niwasa aththatama wahalun samaga ekwa athadanguwata gath, badu sampurna mila gewiya yuthu wenawa, ohuge wahalun thula upatha labana me daruwan ekras karana pala athara wanu atha badu. 50 waganthiya awashya oonama patahani giwisum kumak sandahanwa thibuna da, apa shunya, niyogayak kara nam prakasha kirima ha wana mema daruwan, aadana kotasak ayithi naya wenath thanwala thrupthimath nam, ho konthrathkaru; me sandaha, aththa washayenma alla ganimen pasuwa wahalun lesa upatha lada daruwange aagnyapanathata pera, awasana postarayehi sandahan kala yuthuya.
lankawe me wage wasikili wala wasikili.

palath palana mathiwaranaye chanda prathipala anuwa, eksath jathika pakshaya dewani thanata ada wateddi, thamange thathwaya antha thunwani thanakata ada watunu thathwayak thulath, ranil wikramasinhata pamanak illa aswimata ki janadhipathiwaraya, me wishwasa bhangaya haraha ema ranil wika්ramasinhawama eliyata ada damimata walika thama sagayanwa thawaduratath ema thanathuruwalama thiyagannawa misak owunta illa aswimata kiyathayi kese nam sithannada ?

ema jangama durakathana bhawitha kala pudgalayin lasantha wikramathunga mahatha ෙdenikawa gaman ganna marga osse hambaagos athi bawath, 2009.01.06 wani di sita 2009.01.07 wani dina dakwa kalaya thula upali thennakon mahathage niwasata aasannaye pihita athi dayalog kulunu aawaranaya wana kalapaye da kriyathmakawa thibu bawata warthawalin heli wi athi bawath rahas polisiya adhikaranayata idiripath kala warthawe sandahanwa atha.
ehi pudgalayek mema manushya lokayata aawath penenne naha manda ohuge kaya siyum.
